mapper.select: SELECT UI.*, GENDER.DETAILCDNAME AS GenderDetailName, STATUS.DETAILCDNAME AS EmploymentStatusDetailName, RANK.DETAILCDNAME AS RankDetailName, GRADE.DETAILCDNAME AS GradeDetailName, CONTRACT.DETAILCDNAME AS ContractStatusDetailName FROM USER_INFO UI LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL GENDER ON UI.sexCD = GENDER.DETAILCD AND GENDER.CODEID = 'CD001' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL STATUS ON UI.userStatusCD = STATUS.DETAILCD AND STATUS.CODEID = 'CD002' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL RANK ON UI.userRankCD = RANK.DETAILCD AND RANK.CODEID = 'CD003' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL GRADE ON UI.userGradeCD = GRADE.DETAILCD AND GRADE.CODEID = 'CD004' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL CONTRACT ON UI.conStatusCD = CONTRACT.DETAILCD AND CONTRACT.CODEID = 'CD005' ORDER BY UI.USERNUM DESC
SELECT CD.DETAILCDNAME FROM USER_SKILL US LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_DETAIL CD ON US.DETAILCD = CD.DETAILCD WHERE CD.CODEID = 'CD009' AND US.USERNUM = #{userNum}

SELECT UI.*, STATUS.DETAILCDNAME AS EmploymentStatusDetailName, GRADE.DETAILCDNAME AS GradeDetailName, RANK.DETAILCDNAME AS RankDetailName FROM USER_INFO UI LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL STATUS ON UI.userStatusCD = STATUS.DETAILCD AND STATUS.CODEID = 'CD002' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL GRADE ON UI.userGradeCD = GRADE.DETAILCD AND GRADE.CODEID = 'CD004' LEFT JOIN CODE_DETAIL RANK ON UI.userRankCD = RANK.DETAILCD AND RANK.CODEID = 'CD003' WHERE UI.USERNAME LIKE #{searchUserName} AND UI.USERGRADECD LIKE #{searchUserGrade} AND UI.USERSTATUSCD LIKE #{searchUserStatus} AND UI.STARTDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchUserStartDate}) AND TO_DATE(#{searchUserEndDate}) ORDER BY UI.USERNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USERNUM, USERNAME, USERID, USERPW, USERPHONE, USERBIRTH, addr, ADDRDETAIL, STARTDATE, salary, SEXCD, USERSTATUSCD, USERRANKCD, USERGRADECD, CONSTATUSCD, USEREMAIL, USERIMG) VALUES (user_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userPhone}, #{userBirth}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{startDate}, #{salary}, #{sexCD}, #{userStatusCD}, #{userRankCD}, #{userGradeCD}, #{conStatusCD}, #{userEmail}, #{userImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USERNAME=#{userName}, USERID=#{userId}, USERPW=#{userPw}, USERPHONE=#{userPhone}, USERBIRTH=#{userBirth}, ADDR=#{addr}, ADDRDETAIL=#{addrDetail}, STARTDATE=#{startDate}, SALARY=#{salary}, SEXCD=#{sexCD}, USERSTATUSCD=#{userStatusCD}, USERRANKCD=#{userRankCD}, USERGRADECD=#{userGradeCD}, CONSTATUSCD=#{conStatusCD}, USERIMG=#{userImg} WHERE userNum=#{userNum}
